titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for certain Native American programs.
A bill to authorize appropriations for certain Native American programs.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Indian Affairs.

bill.summary: Amends the Native American Programs Act of 1974 to reauthorize appropriations, through FY2016, for programs that: (1) promote the economic and social self-sufficiency of Native Americans; (2) improve the capability of their governing bodies to regulate environmental quality pursuant to federal and tribal environmental laws; and (3) assist Native Americans in ensuring the survival and continuing vitality of their languages.
